name: Buds hemp/organic cotton fabric - black
description:
Limited Edition Screenprinted Organic Fabric 
This fabric is $96/m and sold in 25cm portions

Black on Off White 288gsm 55% Hemp 45% Organic Cotton. 

Fabric is 145cm (1.58 yard) wide. It is ordered in 25cm (9.8 inch) quantities. I will cut to order. If you order a single quantity, I will cut one fat quarter 72.5 x 50cm (19.7 x 28.5 inches) unless you specify that you want the full width.

Pippijoe prides itself in producing consistent high quality printed fabrics, however as all fabrics are hand printed, variations may occur.

The fabric may be hand or gently machine washed. Warm iron on reverse side, do not dry clean. They are hand screenprinted using environmentally friendly inks.

Screen settings etc may alter the on screen colours. The fabric is a lovely off white and is beautiful in real life!

Pippijoe fabrics are designed and printed in Melbourne, Australia.

Prices in AUD

FREE SHIPPING IN AUSTRALIA

name: Sling Bag Kit
description:
This is a kit contains pattern pieces, fabric, lining, interfacing and instructions to make your own pippijoe sling bag. The finished bag is fully lined and strengthened with interfacing and measures 25cm x 25cm plus straps.

This project is suitable for beginner to intermediate sewers. Pippijoe fabric, interfacing and lining is included. You will need a sewing machine, scissors, a needle, thread to match the pippijoe fabric and some pins.

Also included in the kit are alternative pattern pieces for a cute mini version measuring 10cm across.

Happy Sewing!

FREE SHIPPING IN AUSTRALIA

name: Fabric Basket Kit
description:
This is a kit contains pattern pieces, fabric, lining, interfacing and instructions to make one gorgeous fabric basket which measures 30cm tall and 18cm wide. The finished basket is fully lined and strengthened with interfacing so it happily stands up for itself! Used in my house for knitting, tea towel storage and easter eggs as well as a handbag, I'm sure you'll find other things to hide in it! 

Pippijoe fabric, interfacing and lining is included. You will need a sewing machine, scissors, a needle, thread to match the pippijoe fabric and some pins.

Also included in the kit are alternative pattern pieces for a cute mini version measuring 19cm tall and 10cm across.

Happy Sewing!

FREE SHIPPING IN AUSTRALIA
